resetToDefaults.content: resetToDefaults()→ None: Reset all options to their default values.

len.content:
len(Options)→ int: Returns the total number of options.
a = len(ui.options)

[].content:
[<option name>]→ value: Get or set specific option given an option name key.
v = ui.options['DAT.width']
ui.options['DAT.width'] = 50
